name: Final Frontier (itch) (pandepic)
description:
Final Frontier

This is a mini MMORPG created for the OLC Code Jam 2021: https://itch.io/jam/olc-codejam-2021

Instructions
  • Put in a username and password, then click register, then login to get into the game
  • Your ship turrets will automatically shoot at enemies within range
  • Your shields will always recharge slowly but your armour will only heal when in a friendly system
  • If you die you'll respawn at the human home world with no cost
  • Enemies spawn in systems with no human colony
  • Killing enemies will give exp and credits
  • Gain exp to increase your rank and unlock higher level ships which you buy with credits
  • There's a random chance for all killed enemies to drop procedurally generated loot
  • You can't gain loot once you have 25 items in your inventory, sell items to make space
  • When you buy a ship, any items equipped above the Common tier will be auto moved into your inventory for use with the next ship
Controls
  • Left mouse click to move your ship
  • I to open/close your inventory
  • B to open/close the buy ship menu
  • Spacebar to refocus the camera on your ship
  • Middle mouse to drag the camera
  • Mouse wheel to zoom in/out
